overview: Jason W. Moreau has served as the leading executive of Cytiva Software Inc. (CRX:TSX-V) since forming the company in 1995, and has continuously provided its vision, leadership and management. In that short time, the company has grown to be a leading supplier of Talent Management software for corporate mid-market companies in North America. Mr. Moreau has over 12 years of experience in the software industry, including serving as a consultant to QED Software Solutions Ltd., Whistler Real Estate Co. and Pacific Customs Brokers Ltd. A native of Vancouver, BC, Mr. Moreau holds a Diploma of Computer Science Technology from the British Columbia Institute of Technology.
